CustomField.description: Do not manually update. Updated by automatic processes. See excluded Record Types and FY/CY in Household Settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of (hard-credit) gifts made by this Account in the current FY. See "Total Number of Gifts This Year" for overall # of gifts (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.label: Number of Gifts This Year
